dashboard.label: Novels DM approaches used in PLE.
dashboard.description: Aim on identify improvements and novels approaches in data mining techniques used in product line engineering.

panel.title: RQ13: What techniques can be exploited in engineering product lines?

table.title: Present some examples. Click for go to paper.

search.query: index=paper technique AND product |table DOI titulo

panel.title: RQ14: Among the documents found are evident the innovative proposals or novels approach for product line engineering?

table.title: Present some examples. Click for go to paper.

search.query: index=paper novel* OR innovative |table DOI titulo
